name: Truck Truck
description:
Truck Truck is a physics based game in which the player needs to load the truck and transport the cargo. Control the objects using your mouse. Get stars for completing the levels successfully.

MAIN GAME FEATURES:
1. Use different physical objects to help the truck load
2. Manage destroyable objects
3. Turn on the car engine by clicking
4. Destroy traps
5. Control the physical objects
